document_data.name: Temple of Lolth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Lolth''' was a temple devoted to [[Lolth]], the Spider Queen, located in the small city of [[Elveswatch]] in northern [[Dambrath]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The Temple to Lolth was the largest temple found in Elveswatch, perhaps because attacks from [[elves]] from the [[Forest of Amtar]] brought a large influx of [[drow]] to the city.
